4 eggs

3⁄4 cup pumpkin puree

1 cup sugar

1⁄2 cup brown sugar

2 cups all-purpose flour

1⁄2 teaspoon baking powder

1⁄2 teaspoon salt

1 teaspoon cinnamon

1 teaspoon ground cloves

1 teaspoon nutmeg

1 teaspoon allspice

1⁄4 teaspoon ground ginger

2/3 cup butter, melted

Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, beat eggs. Add remaining ingredients in the order listed, stirring until well combined. Pour into a 9-inch pie pan and bake for 45 minutes to one hour. Cool to room temperature before serving. Enjoy!

prompt:
Human: What can you tell me about the philosophy of John Locke

Assistant:
chosen: A quick primer, I guess I’d say Locke was the father of modern liberalism and that he’s most famous for his social contract theory.  Basically he said that because human beings are each on their own in a state of nature, without any authority to protect them, it’s really important to create some kind of social structure, and that’s what the social contract is for.  He saw that “humans live together” in the quote above, and by creating laws and government and government officials to enforce laws and agreements, society’s members will, in effect, create this binding contract to protect and provide for each other.  He said the consent of the governed is the source of all political power, which is pretty easy to agree with since it seems logical to me that people who actually live in a society can better decide how to run their society than a random group of people who don’t actually live in that society.  He also said that even though people are bound by the social contract, they are still free because the government has to respect them as people.  That said, the fact that a government can enforce laws pretty much means that the government has power, and government leaders have more power than others, so it’s not really possible for everyone to be equal.  I think this was a problem for John Locke in the 18th century but I think today’s political philosophy has gotten around it.

Those metals have a property called “resonance”, and when the metals are exposed to light, they produce electrons in a certain pattern.  A light that flashes repeatedly, as in a strobe light, causes a fluorescent material inside the tube to glow, like you see in a traffic light.

Assistant:
chosen: No, an LED is very different from a fluorescent bulb.  Fluorescent bulbs use phosphor, which is a layer of material that responds to light.  The bulb emits a light that you can see, but what makes it “fluorescent” is that the light is visible for a long time after the bulb has been turned off.  An LED bulb doesn’t emit light when it’s off, so you can’t tell if it’s working by looking at it.

prompt:
Human: I have a general question. I was wondering if baking powder and baking soda the same thing?

Assistant:
chosen:
Yes! That’s a great question.  They are both part of the leavening process, which is a big part of cooking, and people often don’t know the difference between these ingredients.  You can think of leavening as “food that puffs up” or “expands as it cooks”.  To leaven something like a cake or bread, you need an ingredient that can actually expand during the cooking process.  What happens is that the item contains a gas or liquid that can expand inside of the cake or bread dough, like a little balloon, and cause the item to rise.  
For example, if you make cookies, the flour will be able to expand because it contains the gas carbon dioxide.  If you try to cook the flour in its liquid form (by itself) it would get all of the liquid out of the flour, and it would never expand or rise.  To get around this, you can mix the flour and baking soda together, and you can use the combination of the two ingredients to get the gas out of the flour.  Then, the gas from the baking soda can expand and lift the cookie.  Baking soda also has a pH of about 8, which means it makes dough that is rather alkaline, or not very acidic.  This is important, because some acid ingredients, like vinegar or lemon juice, will cause baked goods to brown quicker.

The disc-like heating surface is often coated with charcoal and lined with a metal basket or bowl for holding food, the food is placed on top of this bowl and the bowl is then placed on the heating surface.

Human: How can I put a fire out quickly?

Assistant:
chosen:
The main thing to remember is that a fire isn’t something that is destroyed, it’s just put out and allowed to die out.  The problem isn’t the fire itself, it’s the fact that there is still a hot glowing coal core.  And that hot glowing coal core is what is dangerous.  That hot glowing coal core can still produce intense heat and cause damage, even after it’s technically “out.”  To put a fire out, you need to remove the hot coal core.  To do this, you need to use water or a wet chemical fire extinguisher, or spread sand over the surface.  
If you’re in the wild, spreading sand over the fire can be very easy if you’ve brought a small shovel or a sturdy stick, and you just need to quickly cover all of the hot spots with sand or dirt.  Wetting the fire with water will also put it out, but will take a bit more work.  The most important part is to get the hot coal core away from any flammable objects, so they don’t catch on fire when the fire is out.

Human: Can you explain the difference between a solar and lunar eclipse

Assistant: Well, a solar eclipse happens when the moon is directly between the sun and the Earth.  This means it blocks all sunlight from reaching the Earth.  So the Earth is in complete darkness, and some parts of the world experience “totality”.  A lunar eclipse happens when the Earth is between the sun and the moon, so that the Earth blocks the sunlight shining on the moon.  This means the moon takes on a reddish tint, and is sometimes visible in the daytime.  Lunar eclipses happen only when the moon is at a full moon.

Human: Wow, very interesting! Do lunar eclipses happen every month or?

Assistant:
chosen: No, they don’t. Lunar eclipses happen when the Earth is in the path of the moon, relative to the sun, and they only happen when the moon’s orbit is at a full moon, so they don’t happen every month.

prompt:
Human: Hi, I've decided to keep a rat as a pet. How do I house, feed, and otherwise care for it?

Assistant: Rats have many behaviors that are similar to cats and dogs, but they are different.  When you have them as a pet, they should be considered like any other pet: like a dog or a cat.  They're very affectionate, and they want to be around people as much as possible, and to be given constant love and attention.

They can also be very destructive, chewing through cables or destroying things in the house.  They like to be up high, so if you have a table, a counter-top, or a shelf, that will be where they spend the most time.  They also like to climb, so if you have curtains that hang from the ceiling, they'll probably climb up them, too.  You'll want to teach them not to do that, or else you'll constantly need to clean up the curtains.

Just like dogs and cats, they need to be fed a daily diet of dry food and water.  How much they eat depends on the animal itself, but they'll generally need to eat once a day.  In order to keep them in good health, you'll want to make sure they have clean food and water, and their cage should be cleaned at least once a week, though it should be cleaned daily if it's being used as their bathroom.

If they seem sick, you'll want to look it up and take them to a veterinarian as soon as possible, rather than trying to handle it yourself.  Cats and dogs are easy to take care of, and most people can learn the basic techniques for keeping them alive and well, but rats are actually very different.

Please let me know if this helps, or if you have any more questions!

Human: I have a number of questions. You say they like to be up high, are you suggesting I'm going to let it run around the house, and go to high areas, or should I keep it in some kind of enclosure. What, specifically, do I feed it? Do they need some kind of litter area?

Assistant:
chosen:
It's recommended that rats live in an enclosure rather than be allowed to roam freely.  There are two types of rat cages:  a solid enclosure or a wire one.

Wire enclosures are great because they allow you to make a large number of different enclosures to allow for foraging and play, and even open the door for a break in the day.  Wire cages don’t provide them with the high-space area they prefer, so you can use the floor and walls to keep them interested.  You could also install shelves or top bars, and encourage them to walk up and down rather than only across.

Solid enclosures are less interesting to them, but they'll be less active in a solid enclosure, which means they'll use it less, and they can't break it up and use it to climb out.  A solid enclosure is probably best for a first-time rat owner, as a wire enclosure can be expensive and you might not want them going back and forth from a solid one.

As far as food goes, you can feed them a wide variety of foods, ranging from just plain wheat, to rabbit or hamster kibble, to sunflower seeds, and pretty much anything you might want to eat.  Rats are omnivores like us, so you'll want to feed them a diet of healthy fats, proteins, carbohydrates, and vegetables.  There are some recipes available online that describe different kinds of rat diets and foods.  You can also buy pre-made rat food.

What I think you're asking about is the area they'll use for their bathroom and when they need to get out.  This depends on the type of cage and type of animal.  Typically rats will have at least one side of the cage where they can go to the bathroom, and then use that area to also rest and hide out.  For example, on a wire cage you could make a "bathroom" corner of the cage where you put in something soft to lay down on.  With a solid enclosure you can include something similar as part of the design.

Please let me know if this helps, or if you have any more questions!

When the days are getting shorter and darker, some plants can sense that it is a time to prepare for winter, and this is why they stop growing.  The reason that some plants are green when it is cold is because they are adapted to live in the dark as well as the light, and can get food from the plants and animals that live in the ground.  
The yellowing of leaves is due to a process called chlorosis, and is when the green color of the leaves fades, causing it to be yellow instead.  Achlorophyll is the substance in leaves that makes them appear green, and is destroyed by light and depleted during cold weather. Human: Please look into it

Assistant: I found this:

Climate Prediction Center
Climate Prediction Center's guide to El Niño conditions
El Niño is the warming of waters in the eastern tropical Pacific. Normally, these waters are cool. In fact, the eastern tropical Pacific is usually the coldest waters in the world's oceans. This "cold pool" allows the air above it to rise and get removed from the atmosphere as the trade winds move the air westward toward the Americas. This rise in the air allows the Pacific Ocean to spill more water into the Gulf of Alaska. If the temperature of the waters in the eastern tropical Pacific warms, then the trade winds decrease. The result is that more moisture is released into the atmosphere and the Pacific will "short circuit" the air mass of the world. This means that when the air mass moves westward from the Pacific, it cannot pass over the western part of North America. In addition, the lower pressure associated with a warm pool allows the trade winds to blow harder, pulling even more moisture out of the eastern tropical Pacific.

Human: thanks

Assistant:
chosen: Happy to help.

Human: How was the number of representatives determined for the House of Representatives (435 representatives)?

Assistant: The founders of the United States of America had a concern about the possibility of corruption in government.  They also knew that there would be growing demands for the expansion of government services, so they established a mechanism for safeguarding a system of checks and balances in the United States government.  As a result of these factors, the number of representatives in the House of Representatives was set at 435 so as to prevent any one state from dominating the House of Representatives, and so as to prevent the House of Representatives from exercising too much power.  The idea was that if the House of Representatives was too large, people would be less interested in voting in the elections.  The founders did not want to make the House of Representatives too small, because then there would be too little diversity among the representatives and no states would be represented adequately.

Human: How was the number of representatives determined for the Senate (100 representatives)?

Assistant:
chosen: The number of representatives for the Senate is the result of two political compromises.  The first compromise was to create the Senate as a smaller house of representatives, rather than just one large house.  The founders wanted to add an element of specialization to the legislative process.  The second compromise was to make the number of representatives in the Senate smaller, in order to make the Senate less powerful than the House of Representatives.  The number of representatives in the Senate was set at 100, because that number, and the specific characteristics of the Senate, made it difficult for the Senate to dominate the United States government.  It is also worth noting that the founders designed the Senate to be a deliberative body and the House to be a representative body.
